item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
we are looking for someone to edit videos for us and post them on the meta business suite on our accounts.

It is important that you edit videos on a laptop. preferably with premiere pro. with all smartphone apps you are too slow. there will be jobs where you have to edit 200 videos in one day. (it's usually the same video just with a different mockup font)

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 17, 2024 11:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production
Country: Switzerland

item.title: I need someone to create primitive build videos for my youtube channel - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to create primitive build videos to post on my youtube channel , like these channels

https://youtu.be/Rl_ceUhchbA?si=zoGt-4UUwua5fgan
https://youtu.be/NT0EmAgP-_k?si=qfUZh-CPfJ63u1-M

you may use any tool or machine but dont show it in the video
the footage must be raw and not edited

the price is low for the couple first videos

I might need 5-10 videos a month


Posted On: June 17, 2024 10:47 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, YouTube Development, Adobe Premiere Pro, Graphic Design, Building

item.title: Social Media Video Editor Specialist Reels / Tiktok / Instagram - Upwork
item.description:
Puppies Yoga is seeking an expert social media video editor.
Our social media accounts include: @puppiesyogaparis, @puppiesyogacopenhagen, @puppiesyogahelsinki, @puppiesyogatallin, and @puppiesyogaamsterdam.

This position has the potential to become full-time based on mutual success. You will be responsible for crafting cute and engaging content from our video footage.

Requirements:

Edit short videos/reels from our weekly updated video bank
Deliver at least 5 reels/TikToks per week
We're looking for someone who can create content that captivates our audience.

Additional skills:

Trend following
Knowledge of keywords, SEO, and hashtags
Please include a link to an engaging short video you've edited.

f you are interested in this offer, I will send you a bank of videos so you can provide a sample of your video editing skills for reels/TikTok.

Applications created by ChatGPT will be deleted.



Thank you for your interest in applying!

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 10:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Instagram
Skills: Video Editing, Instagram
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Looking for EXTREMELY High Quality Geolayers Experienced Geopolitics YT Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

I am looking for an EXTREMELY high quality Youtube editor who is able to create incredible content that will keep thousands, millions of viewers entertained, and that includes some motion graphics, not just simple stock footage. The pay will be per minute of video, not a standard rate, and the pay per minute of video will be $16 starting.

The videos will be on the topics of Geopolitics and world events. Having Geolayers is a MUST.

Videos will be 15-20 minutes. I will be providing the script and voiceover, you will be creating high quality edits and finding high quality footage for the video, including digging deep for them if needed

I would like 1 video done every 10-ish days ideally

Here's examples of what I am looking for: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_1IBktNzIoE

These editing skills are exactly the type of editing I am looking for. Please be honest with yourself if you think you can do this or not.  

This is a long term job that can potentially go on for years as well, so it is stable work. Raises over time will be a thing too

Budget: $330
Posted On: June 17, 2024 10:23 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply
